rules.title: Overview
rules.content: The game operates on a turn-by-turn basis. Players train their characters over four in-game years (48 turns) to compete in the JO (major sports event).

rules.title: Characters
rules.content: Each player controls three characters. Characters possess unique abilities and attributes. Movement across the map consumes Movement Points (MP), which reset at the beginning of each turn.

rules.title: Map and Movement
rules.content: The game world features various strategic locations, including Training Centers and Arenas. Each tile on the map requires a specific amount of MP to traverse. MP resets at the start of each turn, enabling new movements.

rules.title: Training Centers
rules.content: Training Centers are designated locations for character enhancement. Players can allocate characters to Training Centers for specialized training over multiple turns. Training regimens vary by center and season, providing different statistical boosts.

rules.title: Tournaments and Arenas
rules.content: Arenas host tournaments where characters compete against AI-controlled opponents. Tournament outcomes are determined by rolling a twenty-sided die (d20), with each roll influencing the match result. Victorious tournaments award characters equipment items that confer bonuses or penalties to their stats. The effectiveness of equipment varies with the seasons, adding strategic depth.

rules.title: Equipment and Items
rules.content: Characters can acquire equipment items by winning tournaments. Combining certain items can yield enhanced bonuses. Equipment bonuses or maluses fluctuate with the seasons, necessitating strategic planning.

rules.title: Turn Structure
rules.content: The game spans 48 turns, representing four in-game years. Each turn permits players to: Move characters across the map. Assign characters to Training Centers. Enter tournaments in Arenas. At the start of each turn, characters’ MP resets, allowing for new movements and actions.

rules.title: Seasons and Strategy
rules.content: The game is segmented into seasons, each influencing gameplay: Training Centers offer different regimens per season. Tournaments align with the seasonal sports calendar. Equipment items’ effectiveness is season-dependent.

rules.title: Winning the Game
rules.content: The game culminates in the JO, where characters compete for ultimate glory. Performance in the JO is influenced by characters' statistics and equipment acquired throughout the game. Strategic decisions made during training, tournaments, and item management throughout the 48 turns will determine the victor.

rules.title: Additional Notes
rules.content: Players must balance training, competing in tournaments, and managing equipment to optimize character development. The combination of strategic planning and chance (via d20 rolls) provides a dynamic and engaging gameplay experience.
